::Zardus/Chordate/Soundwave::

Zardus raises an eyebrow, looking at the hand in front of him. He shruggs. As 
long as he was seeing floating hands, he might as well shake them.

Stretching out his hand, Zardus grasps Sickle, shaking him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Chordate fired one more shot at Skulletron before stopping. He mutters an 
order, and the autoguns stop firing, the panels lifting from the computer 
equipment.

"Take him to the brig. I need a CR," he says whoozilly to Smokescreen, 
walking off toward the CR chambers and straining to keep his balance.

Smokescreen nods, picks up Skulletron, and walks off toward the brig.
